juzs.text: 25|21|Ware to no (shinpan no tame no) kaiken o nozomanai mono wa iu. `Naze tenshi ga watashi-tachi ni kudasa renai no ka. Mata (naze) watashi-tachi no omo ga,-me no mae ni mienai nodearou ka.' Kare-ra wa hontoni unuborete komandeari, mata hijo ni oheina taido o totta nodearu.
25|22|Kare-ra ga tenshi o miru hi, tsumibito ni totte, yorokobi no nai hidearu. Kare-ra (tenshi) wa iudearou. ` (Anata gata ni wa) kinji rarete iru, tozakare.'
25|23|Ware wa kare-ra no okonatta koto ni mukuite, sore o chiri no yo ni makichirasudearou.
25|24|Rakuen no nakama wa sonohi, subarashi sumai ni ochitsuite, kokoroyoi hirune-sho ni iyou.
25|25|Sonohi, ten wa kumo to tomoni sake, tenshi-tachi ga tsukawasa re (taikyo shite) kudaru.
25|26|Sonohi, shin no taiken wa, jihibukaki okata ni zokusuru. Fushin-sha ni totte wa, tanan no hidearu.
25|27|Sonohi, aku o okonatta mono wa,(shimatta to,) sono-te o (kami), iudearou. `A , watashi ga moshi shito to tomoni (tadashi) michi o erande itanaraba.
25|28|A, nasakenai, watashi ga an'na mono o tomo to shinakattanaraba.
25|29|Hontoni kare wa, kunkai ga kudatta nochi ni watashi o mayowa seta nodesu. Akuma wa tsuneni ningen o uragirimasu.'
25|30|Shito wa iu. `Omo yo, hontoni watashi no hitobito wa, kono kuruan o imubeki mono to shite kyohi shimasu.'
25|31|Ware wa kono yo ni, sorezore no yogen-sha ni, tsumibukaki-sha-tachi no naka kara teki o tsukuru. Daga shido-sha, enjo-sha to shite wa anata no omo dakede jubundearu.

25|32|Mata shinko shinai mono wa,`kuruan wa naze ichido ni zenkan ga kudasa renai nodesu ka.' To iu. Ko suru no wa, ware ga anata no kokoro o kengo ni suru tame, yoku totonoete junjoyoku fukusho sa seru tamedearu.
25|33|Mata, kare-ra ga 譬 O, anata ni mochidashite kuru tabi ni shinri to zen no kaishaku (no tegakari) o anata ni ataeru tamedearu.
25|34|Kao o utsumukete jigoku ni atsume rareru-sha, korera wa aku no kyochi ni oka reru, hidoku michinimayotta-shadearu.
25|35|(Kore yori saki) ware wa musa ni keiten o sazuke, sono kyodai harun o agete kare no hojo-sha to shita.
25|36|Ware wa sonotoki (meijite) itta. `Anata gata ryonin wa, waga shirushi o kyohi suru min no moto ni ike.' Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o tetteiteki ni 懲 Shimete kaimetsu shita.
25|37|Mata nufu no min wa shito o kyohi shitanode, ware wa kare-ra o obore sasete, hitobito e no shirushi to shita. Ware wa aku o okonau mono no tame ni, itamashi chobatsu o junbi shite iru.
25|38|Mata ado to samudo to rassu no jumin-tachi, soshite sonoaida no iku sedai.
25|39|Ware wa sorezore no min ni jitsurei o motte keikoku shi, mata (sono tsumi ni taishi) sorezore o tetteiteki ni kaimetsu shita.
25|40|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa, wazawai no ame o dotto fura sa reta machi o, tabitabi otozurete iru. Kare-ra wa sore o minakatta no ka, iya, kare-ra wa fukkatsu no hi nado omoi mo yoranakatta nodearu.
25|41|Kare-ra ga anata o miru toki, tada reisho no-teki ni suru dakedearu. (Soshite iu. ) `Arra ga, shito to shite tsukawasa reta no wa, kono-shadearu no ka.

25|42|Moshi watashi-tachi ga kamigami ni taishi, shikkari shite inakattanaraba, kare wa ayauku sore kara madowashi denrai no kamigami o misuteru tokorodeatta.'Daga, yagate chobatsu o miru toki, dare ga, mottomo michinimayotta ka ga wakarudearou.
25|43|Anata wa jibun no omowaku o,-shin to shite (omoikomu)-sha o mita no ka. Anata wa kare-ra no gadian ni naru tsumorina no ka.
25|44|Soretomo kare-ra no oku wa mimi o katamuke, matawa satoru to demo omotte iru no ka. Kare-ra wa kachiku no yona mono ni suginai. Iya, sore yori mo michi kara mayotte iru.
25|45|Omo wa ikaga ni kage o hiroge rareta ka, anata wa minakatta no ka. Moshi kare ga o nozominaraba, sore o seishishita mama ni sa reyou. Sorekara ware wa, taiyo o sono an'nai-yaku to shita.
25|46|Sokode ware wa, yuruyakana ashidori de ware no kata ni hikiyoseru.
25|47|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni yoru o tobari to sa re, suimin shite kyusoku sa se, hiruma o yomigaeri (no toki) to nasa reta okatadearu.
25|48|Mata kare koso wa, sono jiu o furasu mae ni, kippo no kaze o fuki okosu okatadearu. Soshite ware wa, ten kara seijona ame o furasu.
25|49|Ware wa sore de shinda daichi ni seimei o atae, mata ware ga tsukutta musu no kachiku ya ningen ni noma sete yaru.
25|50|Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzuku yo ni, kare-ra no ma de kore o kurikaeshi (te kaimei shi)ta. Daga dai tasu no ningen wa, tada kobamu dakedeatta.
25|51|Ware ga moshi nozomunaraba, dono machi ni mo keikoku-sha o 1-ri dzutsu tsukawashitadearou.
25|52|Dakara fushin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra ni taishi kono (kuruan) o motte oini funto doryoku shi nasai.
25|53|Kare koso wa, futatsunoumi o wake hedate rareta okatadearu. Hitotsu wa amaku shite umai,-gai wa shiokaraku shite nigai. Ryosha no ma ni shoheki o moke, kanzen ni bunri nasa reta.
25|54|Kare koso wa, mizu kara ningen o tsukuri, ketto ni yoru shinzoku to kon'in no kankei o sadame rareta kata. Hontoni anata no omo wa zen'no de ara reru.
25|55|Daga kare-ra wa arra o sashioite mueki mugai no mono ni tsukaeru. Hontoni fushin-sha wa, jibun no omo ni hanko suru mono (akuma) no enjo-shadearu.
25|56|Ware wa, tada kippo no dentatsu-sha, mata keikoku-sha to shite anata o tsukawashita dakedearu.
25|57|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa kore ni taishi, anata gata ni nani no hoshu mo motomenai. Daremoga,-nushi e no (tadashi) michi o nozomeba yoi'
25|58|shinu koto no nai eisei-sha o shinrai shite, kare o tataete 唱念 Shi nasai. Kare wa, shimo be-tachi no subete no tsumi o kanzen ni jukuchi sa reru.

25|59|Kare wa, ten to ji soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, 6-nichi no ma ni sozo shi, sorekara gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru jihibukaki okata de ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsuite jukuchi suru mono ni toe.

25|60|Daga kare-ra ga,`jihibukaki okata ni sajida shi nasai.' To iwa reru to, kare-ra wa iu. `Jihibukaki okata to wa nanidesu ka. Watashi-tachi wa anata no meijiru mono ni sajida suru nodesu ka.' To, kaette (shinri kara no) tohi o masu bakari. 〔Sajida〕
25|61|ten ni sho seiza o haichi shi, sonoaida ni taiyo to terasu tsuki o oka reta okata ni, shukufuku are.
25|62|Kare koso wa, hansei shi, kansha shiyou to suru mono no tame ni yoru to hiru o moke, kotai sa seta katadearu.
25|63|Jihibukaki okata no shimo be-tachi wa, kenkyo ni chijo o aruku mono, mata muchi no to (tashinkyo to) ga hanashikakete mo,`heian'are.' To (aisatsu shite) iu monodearu.
25|64|Mata omo no gozen ni sajida (matawa) kiritsu shite, yoru o sugosu mono.
25|65|Mata,`omo yo, jigoku no chobatsu o watashi-tachi kara opparatte kudasai. Hontoni ano chobatsu wa, kurushimi no kiwamidesu.
25|66|Hontoni sore wa warui sumaideari, warui yasumi-shodesu.' To iu monodearu.
25|67|Mata (zaika o) tsukau sai ni rohi shinai mono, mata rinshokude mo naku, yoku sono chukan o tamotsu mono.

25|68|Arra to narabete,-gai no don'na kami ni mo inoranai mono, seitonariyu ga nai kagiri, arra ga kinji rareta sessho o okasu koto naku, mata kan in shinai monodearu.Daga oyoso son'na koto o suru mono wa, chobatsu sa reru.
25|69|Fukkatsu no hi ni wa chobatsu wa (tsumi ni oji) baika sa re, sono (jigoku de) kutsujoku no naka ni eien ni sumudearou.
25|70|Kaigo shite shinko shi, zenko ni hagemu mono wa betsudearu. Arra wa korera no mono no, iroirona hiko o kaete zenko ni sa reru. Arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
25|71|Kaigo shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa, honki de arra ni kuite iru monodearu.
25|72|Uso no shogen o shinai mono, mata muda-banashi o shite iru soba o toru toki mo jicho shite torisugiru mono.
25|73|Mata wadai ga omo no shirushi ni oyobeba tsunbo 啞者 Ka mojindearu ka no yo ni, 戯-Ra ni shiranaifuri o shinai mono.
25|74|Soshite,`omo yo, kokoro no nagusame to naru tsuma to shison o watashi-tachi ni atae,-nushi o osoreru mono no mohan ni shite kudasai.' To (inotte) iu mono.
25|75|Korera no mono wa, sono taeshinonda koto ni yori takai kai-i no sumai o motte (rakuen no naka ni) mukuwa reyou. Mata sokode kangei to aisatsu no kotoba o motte mukae rareyou.
25|76|Soko ni eien ni sumu nodearu. Nanto yoi sumai, nanto yoi yasumi-shodearu koto yo.

25|77|(Fushin-sha ni) itte yaru ga i. `Anata gataga watashi no omo ni inoranainara, kare wa anata gata o, kamatte kudasaranaidearou. Anata gata wa hontoni (omo o) usotsuki yobawari shitaga, yagate manukare rarenai (chobatsu ga) kudarudearou.'
26|1|Ta su~in mimu.
26|2|Kore wa meiryona keiten no shirushidearu.
26|3|Kare-ra ga shinja ni narou to shinai tame, anata wa tabun, shinuhodo kuno shite iru kotodearou.
26|4|Moshi ware ga sono tsumori to nari, ten kara shirushi o kudaseba, kare-ra wa sore ni osoreitte kenkyo ni narudearou.
26|5|Daga, jihibukaki okata kara kare-ra ni atarashi kunkai ga motarasa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa itsumo somuki saru.
26|6|Kare-ra wa (sore o) usodearu to suru.Daga ima ni sono guro suru koto ga, shinjitsu to natte, kare-ra ni furikakaru nodearu.
26|7|Kare-ra wa, ka no daichi o minai no ka. Ikaga ni oku no, subete no totoi mono o, ware wa soko de sodateru ka o.
26|8|Hontoni sono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|9|Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okatadearu.
26|10|Anata no omo ga musa ni yobikake, ko ose rareta toki o omoi nasai. `Fuhona min no moto ni ike.
26|11|Firuaun no min no moto ni. Kare-ra wa omo o osorenai no ka.'
26|12|Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi no omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi o uso-tsuki yobawari suru koto o osore ma su.
26|13|Watashi no mune wa appaku sa re, mata watashi no shita wa motsuremasu. Desukara harun o, noko washi (tasuke)te kudasai.
26|14|Mata (sono Jo) kare-ra wa, watashi ni tsumi o ka shite irunode, watashi o korosu no o osoremasu.'
26|15|Kare wa ose rareta. `Kesshite sode wanai. Anata gata ryonin wa, waga shirushi o motte ike. Hontoni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni ite, kiite iru nodearu.
26|16|Sorede anata gata ryonin wa, firuaun no moto ni itte itte yaru ga i. “Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yu no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shitodearukara,
26|17|Isuraeru no shison o, watashi-tachi to issho ni ika sete kudasai” to.'
26|18|Kare wa itta. `Anata wa yosho no toki, watashi-tachi no ma de sodate raretade wanai ka. Anata no shogai no oku no nengetsu o, watashi-tachi no ma de sugoshitade wanai ka.
26|19|Sorenanoni anata wa hidoi koto o shidekashita monoda. Anata wa onwowasureru-sha no nakamadearu.'
26|20|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Watashi ga, sore o okonatta no wa jado ni fumi mayotte ita toki no kotodearu.
26|21|Sorede watashi wa osoroshiku natte, anata gatakara nige dashita. Daga,-nushi wa watashi ni chishiki o sazukete, shito no hitori to nasa reta nodearu.
26|22|Anata wa Isuraeru no shison o dorei to shite okinagara, sore ga watashi ni koi o shimesu onkeidearu to demo iu nodesu ka.'
26|23|Firuaun wa itta. `Ban'yu no omo to wa, nandesuka.'
26|24|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no yu no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi (kore o) satottanaraba.'
26|25|Kare (firuaun) wa, sayu no mono ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata wa kikimashita ka.'
26|26|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Anata gata no shu, mata mukashikara no anata gata no sosen no omode mo ara remasu.'
26|27|Kare (firuaun wa sayu no mono ni) itta. `Anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kono shito wa, hontoni kichigaidesu.'
26|28|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Azuma to nishi, mata sonoaida ni aru ban'yu no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi rikai suru nodeareba.'
26|29|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata ga, moshi watashi igai ni kami o taterunaraba, watashi wa kanarazu anata o shujin ni surudeshou.'
26|30|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Watashi ga moshi, meihakuna nanimono ka o, anata ni motarashite modesu ka.'
26|31|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata no iu koto ga hontonara, sore o shimeshi nasai.'
26|32|Sorede (musa) wa tsue o nageta. Miruga i. Sore wa akiraka ni hebi to naru.
26|33|Mata kare no tewosashinoberu to, miruga i. Sore wa dare ga mite mo masshirodearu.
26|34|Kare (firuaun) wa sayu no choro-tachi ni itta. `Hontoni kore wa, roren'na majutsu-shidearu.
26|35|Kare wa sono majutsu de, anata gata o kono kuni kara oidasou to shite iru. Sorede anata gata wa do shiyo to iu no ka.'
26|36|Kare-ra wa itta. ` (Hisashiku) kare to sono kyodai o taiki sa se, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni noko washi,
26|37|subete no roren'na majutsu-shi o anata no moto ni meshidasa reyo.'
26|38|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, kimerareta-bi no kimerareta jikoku ni atsume rareta.
26|39|Mata minshu ni mukatte mo,`anata gata wa (zenbu) shugo shita no ka.' To tsuge rareta.
26|40|(Hitobito wa iu. ) `Majutsu-shi no kata ga kateba, watashi-tachi wa kare-ra (no oshie) ni shitagaoude wanaidesu ka.'
26|41|Majutsu-shi-tachi wa yattekurunari, firuaun ni itta. `Watashi-tachi ga kateba, kanarazu hobi ga arudeshou ka.'
26|42|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Mochirondearu. So no baai anata gata wa, kanarazu sokkin to narou.'
26|43|Musa wa kare-ra ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata no nageru mono o, nage nasai.'
26|44|Sokode kare-ra wa, nawa to tsue o nagete itta. `Firuaun no o iko ni chikai kete, watashi-tachi wa kanarazu shori-sha ni narou.'
26|45|Sonotoki musa ga tsue o nageru to, miruga i. Sore wa kare-ra no netsuzo shita mono o, nomikonde shimatta.
26|46|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, satto fushi sajida shite,
26|47|itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yu no omo o shinjimasu.
26|48|Musa to harun no omo o.'

26|49|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata gata wa, watashi no yurushi mo enai uchi ni kare o shinjiru no ka. Kitto kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta, anata gata no shuchodearou. Daga, yagate omoishirudearou. Watashi wa kanarazu anata gata no te to ashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shi, anata gata o, subete haritsuke no kei ni surudearou.'
26|50|Kare-ra wa itta. `Kamaimasen. Watashi-tachi wa, jibun no omo no moto ni kaeru dakedesukara.
26|51|Watashi-tachi no negai wa, tada-nushi ga, watashi-tachi no kazukazu no ayamachi o yurusa re, watashi-tachi ga shinja-tachi no sakigake ni naru kotodesu.'
26|52|Ware wa musa ni,`waga shimo be-tachi to issho ni, yoru no ma ni tabidate. Anata gata wa kanarazu otte ga kakarudearou.' To keiji shita.
26|53|Sonotoki firuaun wa, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni tsukawashi,
26|54|(iwa seta) `korera no mono wa, hon'no shosu no mure ni suginai nodesu.
26|55|Kare-ra wa, watashi-tachi ni hara o tatete irudeshouga,
26|56|watashi-tachi wa, keikai o totonoe, gunzei mo oi nodesu.'
26|57|Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o kaju-en ya izumi kara oidashi,
26|58|zaiho ya eiyo aru chii kara tsuiho shita.
26|59|Son'na shidaideatta. Soshite ware wa Isuraeru no shison-tachi ni, korera no mono o (soto no tokoro de) tsuga seta.
26|60|Sate kare-ra (firuaun no gunzei) wa hinode no toki, kare-ra o otte kita.
26|61|Ryosha ga tagaini sugata ga mieru yo ni naru to, musa no nakama wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, kanarazu oitsuka rerudearou.'
26|62|Kare (musa) wa itta. `Kesshite, kesshite. Hontoni omo wa watashi to tomoni ora remasu. Sugu ni onmichibiki ga arudeshou.'
26|63|Sonotoki, ware wa musa ni keiji shita. `Anata no tsue de umi o ute.' Suruto sore wa wakaretaga, sorezore no wareta bubun wa kyodaina yama no yodeatta.
26|64|Ware wa mata,-gai no gun o soko ni obiki konda.
26|65|Soshite ware wa, musa soshite kare to tomoni ita hitobito subete o sukutta.
26|66|Daga hoka no mono-tachi o, obore saseta.
26|67|Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|68|Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|69|Iburahimu no monogatari o kare-ra ni katari nasai.
26|70|Kare ga chichioya to kare no hitobito ni mukatte,`anata gata wa nani o suhai suru nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|71|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa guzo o suhai shi, itsumo kore ni tsukaeru nodesu.'
26|72|Kare wa itta. `Anata gata ga inoru toki kare-ra (guzo) wa kiku no ka.
26|73|Mata kare-ra (guzo) wa, anata gata o ekisuru nodesu ka, soretomo gaisuru nodesu ka.'
26|74|Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi no sosen ga, koshite iru no o mita nodesu.'
26|75|Kare wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, anata gataga ima made suhai shite kita mono ni tsuite kangaete mita nodesu ka.
26|76|Anata gata mo, mukashi no sosen-tachi mo (suhai shite ita mono ni tsuite).
26|77|Ban'yu no omo o nozoite wa, kare-ra wa watashi no tekidesu.
26|78|Kare wa watashi o tsukura reta kata de, watashi o michibika re,
26|79|watashi ni shokuryo o shikyu shi, mata inryo o sadzuke rareta okata.
26|80|Mata byoki ni nareba, kare wa watashi o iyashite kudasaimasu.
26|81|Watashi o shina se, sorekara ikikaera se rareru okata.
26|82|Shinpan no hi ni wa, zaika o o yurushi kudasa reru yo, watashi ga negai nozomu katadearu.
26|83|Omo yo, eichi o watashi ni sazuke, tadashi-sha-tachi no nakama ni irete kudasai.
26|84|Watashi o atoato no yo made shinjitsu o tsutaeta mono to shite kudasai.
26|85|Watashi o shifuku no en o tsugu mono ni nasa re,
26|86|watashi no chichi o o yurushi kudasai. Hontoni kare wa mayotta mono no nakamadesuga.
26|87|Mata (hitobito ga) fukkatsu sa se rareru hi ni, watashi no menboku o ushinawa senaide kudasai.
26|88|Sonohi ni wa, zaiho mo musuko-tachi mo, yakudachimasen.
26|89|Tada yogore no nai kokoro o, arra ni bo-geru mono dake wa betsudesuga.'
26|90|Rakuen wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni chikadzuke rare,
26|91|jado ni mayotta mono ni wa, hi goku ga arawareyou.
26|92|Soshite kare-ra wa iwa reyou. `Anata gataga, agamete ita (kamigami) wa doko ni iru nodesu ka.
26|93|Arra o soto ni shite (hai shite ita mono) wa anata gata o tasuke rareru nodesu ka, matawa jibun jishin o tasuke rareru nodesu ka.'
26|94|Sokode kare-ra mo yuwaku shita-sha-tachi mo, sono naka ni nagekoma reru.
26|95|Mata iburisu (akuma) no gunzei mo zenbu issho ni.
26|96|Kare-ra wa soko de, koron shite iudearou.
26|97|`Arra ni chikatte iimasu. Watashi-tachi wa akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodesu.
26|98|Ban'yu no omo to doi ni, anata gata o hai shita nodesukara.
26|99|Watashi-tachi o mayowa seta no wa, tsumibukaimono-tachi nihokanaranai.
26|100|Sorede watashi-tachi ni wa, dare mo torinasu mono mo naku,
26|101|hitori no shin no tomo mo nai nodesu.
26|102|Watashi-tachi ga moichido kaeru koto ga dekirunara, hontoni shinja no nakama ni hairu nodesuga.'
26|103|Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|104|Hontoni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|105|Nufu no min mo, shito-tachi o shinjinakatta.
26|106|Kare-ra no doho no nufu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa,-nushi o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|107|Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|108|Sore de arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|109|Watashi wa, sore ni taishi anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|110|Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.'
26|111|Kare-ra wa itta. `Mottomo iyashi-sha-tachi ga anata ni shitagatte iru to iu no ni, watashi-tachi made anata o shinjiru nodesu ka.'

27|47|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi ga anata to, anata no nakama no mono ni tsuite tori uranai suruto kyo to demashita.'(Kare wa kotaete) itta. `Anata gata no kyocho wa, arra no omoto ni arimasu. Iya, anata gata koso wa (arra ni yotte) kokoromi rarete iru mindesu.'
27|48|Kono machi ni wa 9-ri no ichidan ga ita. Kare-ra wa chijo ni gaiaku o nagashi kaishin shinakatta.

27|49|Kare-ra wa itta. `Kare (sarifu) to sono kazoku o yashu suru yo ni, arra ni kakete chikai aou. Sonogo kare no hogo-sha ni tsugemashou. “Watashi-tachi wa, kare no kazoku no satsugai o mokugeki shite imasen. Hontodeari usode wa arimasen.”'
27|50|Kare-ra wa sakubo shite takurandaga, ware mo saku o-jun shita. Daga kare-ra wa (sore ni) kidzukanai.
27|51|Dakara miruga i. Kare-ra no sakubo no ato ga don'na monodeatta ka o. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra to sono min o isseini horoboshite shimatta.
27|52|Kakute kore koso, fugi o okonatta tame ni haikyo to-ka shita kare-ra no jukyo atodearu. Hontoni kono naka ni chishiki aru min e no hitotsu no shirushi ga aru.
27|53|Soshite ware wa, shinko shite omo o osoreru-sha-tachi o sukutta.
27|54|(Ware wa mata) ruto (o tsukawashita), kare ga sono min ni ko itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa (fugidato) mitomete inagara, harenchina koi o suru nodesu ka.
27|55|Anata gata wa, joyoku o motte on'na-tachi o sashioite otoko no moto ni iku nodesu ka. Iya, anata gata wa, hontoni muchi no mindesu.'
